bin\solr start -p 8983 ``` **-p 8983**8983. #### 4.core coresolrcorecore ``` bash bin\solr create -c corename1 ``` corename1core http://localhost:8983/solr/#/ coreadmincore 5.schema #### #Schema field type javatextlongfield typesmartcnik smartcnsolrsolr-6.6.0\contrib\analysis-extras\lucene-libs\ lucene-analyzers-smartcn-6.6.0.jarsmartcnjarsolr-6.6.0\server\solr-webapp\webapp\WEB-INF\libsolr-6.6.0\server\solr-webapp\j2eeschema.xml ``` javascript ``` Ikgithub jarsolr-6.6.0\server\solr-webapp\webapp\WEB-INF\libxmldcsolr-6.6.0\server\solr-webapp\webapp\WEB-INF\classesschema.xml ```javascript ``` fieldtypefield #### 6 ./ Solr\xml\json\ ##### xml\json\ api,win10bug postwindows ```javascript java -Dc=[corename] -Dauto=yes -Ddata=files -Drecursive=yes -jar example/exampledocs/post.jar G:\abc\*.json ``` dccoreabc.json json ##### solrsolrconfig.xmlsolrconfig.xmldataconfig.xml,solr field ```javascript conf/dataconfig.xml ``` dataconfig.xml: ```javascript ``` ![Alt text](3.png) #### 7. solr![Alt text](4.png) |   |   | :-------- | --------: | q| | fq| sqlwhere field=value | sort | ++asc/desc | start rows| | fl| sql | df | | wt | | indent true or false | | debug| debugquery/timing/results/all(true) https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/Common+Query+Parameters#CommonQueryParameters-ThesortParameter #### 8edismax |   |   |   | :-------- | --------| --------: | | solr| solr-6.6.0\server\solr\resume5\conf => ,,,SWUFE ||XX| \solr-6.6.0\server\solr-webapp\webapp\WEB-INF\classes\mydict.dic | X| |dismax/edismaxsolr20-30 edismax![Alt text](5.png) |   |   | :-------- | --------: | q.alt| q | qf| ^ ^,1 | mm| 3 375%75%3<75%max[3,75%]--33 | pf| qf edismaxbfhttps://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/The+DisMax+Query+Parser bfqflucene #### 9.javasolr solrjspostsolrjava\ruby\pythonAPIJavaapijsurlmaven ```java org.apache.solr solr-solrj 6.6.0 ``` solrjmavenJava ```java SolrClient solr = new HttpSolrClient.Builder(solrUrl).build(); SolrQuery query = new SolrQuery(); query.setQuery(searchParams.getQueryString()); query.set("start", start); query.set("rows", limit); query.set("wt", "json"); QueryResponse rsp = solr.query(query); SolrDocumentList docs = rsp.getResults(); ``` Solrhlqfdismaxhl.flqfhl.flqfqf ```java query.setHighlight(true); query.set("defType", "dismax"); query.set("hl.fl","*"); query.set("hl.usePhraseHighlighter",true); query.set("hl.highlightMultiTerm",true); query.set("hl.simple.pre",""); query.set("hl.simple.post",""); query.set("qf","school^90 name^90 address^0.05 resumeNumber^1 position^90 education^1 major^5 telephone^1 mail^1"); ``` baidugoogle: ```java hlDocs.setNumFound(docs.getNumFound()); Map>> tempMap = rsp.getHighlighting(); for(int i=0;i ``` #### 3. solrmorelikethissolrtermVectors="true"resumeid58901 ```javascript select? resumeId=58901&mlt=true&mlt.fl=major&mlt.mindf=1&mlt.mintf=1&wt=json ``` : |   |   | :-------- | --------: | mlt | | mlt| | mlt.mintf | | mlt.mindf| https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/solr/MoreLikeThis
